meanings.definition: A person who is excessively concerned with minor details and rules.
meanings.sent1: The precisian meticulously checked every comma and period in the document.
meanings.sent2: The office precisian always made sure all the files were perfectly organized.
meanings.sent3: The precisian insisted on measuring the exact distance between each book on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: She was a precisian when it came to following the recipe for the cake.
meanings.sent5: The precisian's attention to detail was unmatched in the group.

meanings.definition: One who adheres strictly to a particular doctrine or set of principles.
meanings.sent1: The religious precisian never missed a day of prayer at the temple.
meanings.sent2: As a political precisian, he always voted according to his party's beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The precisian of fashion never wore anything that wasn't in style.
meanings.sent4: She was a precisian in her dedication to the environmental cause.
meanings.sent5: The precisian's commitment to his beliefs was unwavering.
